channel.title: Help, wierd clienthandler problem
channel.description: Ok, when i added my server into a status list the thingy checks my server every 5 minutes but when it does that the server adds it to the playercount so if i leave it on for 30 mins it would add 6 "players" to playercount and it will give a wrong ::players command.

item.title: Help, wierd clienthandler problem
item.dc:creator: @freakolivier freakolivier
item.description:
@freakolivier wrote:

Ok, when i added my server into a status list the thingy checks my server every 5 minutes but when it does that the server adds it to the playercount
so if i leave it on for 30 mins it would add 6 “players” to playercount and it will give a wrong ::players command.

Read full topic
